title: Domino dehydration/intermolecular (enantioselective) ketone-ene reactions catalysed by a simple solid in batch and in flow
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32944-32957
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06449F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Miguel Espinosa, Antonio Leyva-Pérez
Extremely cheap solids catalyse the one-pot dehydration/intermolecular ketone-ene reaction in batch and in flow, and also enantioselectively.
